title: Decreasing pH when added to a sample of water

content.question: Which of the following compounds would be most effective in decreasing the <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>pH</mi></math> when added to a sample of water that has a <math alttext="p H" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>pH</mi></math> of <math alttext="10.3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>10.3</mn></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="N a C 2 H 3 O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mtext>NaC</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mtext>H</mtext><mn>3</mn></msub><msub><mtext>O</mtext><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 4.A: Predict and/or explain chemical properties or phenomena (e.g., of atoms or molecules) using given chemical theories, models, and representations.
